```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
source("run_config.R")
```

```{bash engine.path="/bin/bash"}
ls $RAW_FASTQS/*.fastq.gz
```

```{bash engine.path="/bin/bash"}
fastqc --quiet --threads $TOTAL_THREADS $RAW_FASTQS/*.fastq.gz --adapters $FASTQC_ADAPTERS --outdir $QC_RAW_DIR
```

```{bash engine.path="/bin/bash"}
multiqc --force $QC_RAW_DIR --outdir ${QC_DIR} --filename multiqc_total_reads_raw.html
```
